attributes.action: to scrape road toll charges or last resort a one day strike
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: this would be alast resort if the goverment decide to go ahead without listening to the peaple this would make the goverment stand up and think

rejection.details: We petition the Prime Minister to "to scrape road toll charges or last resort a one day strike" does not make any sense.
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
